nodes.documentation: Server Key retrieval service contract.
nodes.name: SecretStoreServerKeyRetrievalService

nodes.documentation: When sever key retrieval request is received.
nodes.name: ServerKeyRetrievalRequested

nodes.documentation: When server key is retrieved.
nodes.name: ServerKeyRetrieved

nodes.documentation: When error occurs during server key retrieval.
nodes.name: ServerKeyRetrievalError

nodes.documentation: Constructor.
We do not support direct payments.
Retrieve existing server key. Retrieved key will be published via ServerKeyRetrieved or ServerKeyRetrievalError.
nodes.name: retrieveServerKey

 Returns: (serverKeyId)
